TopicTitle: Do you ever visit Spacecraft Exchange?

Articles.Content: I was curious, does anyone here visit the Spacecraft Exchange forum? I tend to spend most of my time there nowadays whereas I used to be in General KSP Discussion. What other KSP forums do you frequent?

I don't ever do the Spacecraft Exchange because I like to build my own spacecraft.

But I do like to go on the fan-works forum and the Add-On Affair Showcases.
I usually stay on Discussion, Challenges and Spacecraft Exchange.
Am I the only one who spams the "New Posts" like a maniac and click on anything that seems interesting?

Am I the only one who spams the "New Posts" like a maniac and click on anything that seems interesting?

This mainly,Doesn't even matter if it's a gameplay question.

Am I the only one who spams the "New Posts" like a maniac and click on anything that seems interesting?

Nope, that's exactly what I do.
Addons Releases and show cases take up 90% of my browsing on this forums.

Am I the only one who spams the "New Posts" like a maniac and click on anything that seems interesting?

My daily routine is to check my subscriptions and then check out New Posts for anything interesting.
I wander there sometimes, to check the awesome things that people build

Before starting a new build, I like to go there for inspiration. I have a number of really excellent designs bookmarked so I can see certain techniques in action. I don't, however, fly anyone's craft but my own.

Haven't looked around that section of the forums yet. I might do so soon, I have some interesting creations to share.

I mainly hang out here and in the Fan Works subforum. I also pop up to Welcome Aboard and say hi to new folks up there from time to time.
My main hangouts for this forum are General Discussion and Addons. Sometimes I go to the spacecraft exchange to check out other people's crafts. I always build my own craft, so I don't download.

Two words: "Forum" and "Games"

But otherwise, the "Welcome Aboard" section, "Challenges", and "Space Lounge".
Users tend to build amazing stuff, and that's why I visit spacecraft exchange. They inspire me :-)

General discusion, the Labs, Spacecraft exchange and occasionally Gameplay would be where I'm active the most. Though I don't download others' crafts (at least not for the "serious" save), a lot of the stuff posted is really awesome and good for getting inspiration. That said, my thread there has yet to garner any attention
All of 'em for me. General discussion, parts and mods, and sitting in awe of the crafts.

Spacecraft Exchange? No. I've hardly ever gone there.

I frequent General KSP Discussion, Mission Reports, and The Science Labs.

I don't ever do the Spacecraft Exchange because I like to build my own spacecraft.

But I do like to go on the fan-works forum and the Add-On Affair Showcases.

I tend to build my own craft too, but I always hang out in the spacecraft exchange to see if there are any new innovations in space craft designs that I could incorporate into my current fleet. The best ones are where the community comes to gether to improve a design that you posted and you have a wonderful machine of exploration in the end.

I think I went there once or twice a year ago. Usually, I frequent General Discussion, the Science Labs, the Gameplay Questions and Tutorials section, most of the Add-On sections, and I used to go to the Challenges section.

I also visit the other sections infrequently.
I hit it when I'm stuck on a design.
I don't download anything but I look there often, I just like to look at what other people build. Lots of cool stuff to see.
I look there and download a few craft, but never actually USE it.
I check it frequently. I never download anything though - I use it for inspiration.
